CBD industry needs an ‘Emerald Exchange’ type event where Hemp Farmers can connect directly with MJ and Hemp Product Manufacturers. The brokers in this market along with fake buyers are the reason no one trusts anyone and prices continue to fall, hurting the limited number of farmers who are trying to cultivate quality honest product. Need to cut out the middle man and help everyone get a fair price to truly calm down this market. Let’s build long term business relationships and treat people with respect.
Looking to connect with Hemp Farms and CBD product manufacturers around the country to facilitate this movement.
Cannabis colleagues: Here is my cannabis question for this weekend!
I'm having a hard time getting into those sweet dabs. Any advice or thoughts?
More detail: I smoke flower mainly because I love the taste. Dabbing gives my lungs pain.
Why? Why can’t I dab like champ? Meg Champion Thoughts?

Avia Travel Services is a hospitality travel technology solutions provider founded in 1994 which provides private label, B2B and B2C web based travel booking engines, group and event lodging applications as well as travel services for both the FIT leisure and group travel space.

Taking from a business lifetime of entrepreneurial start-ups, with a Rolodex of service and financial contacts spanning over 4 decades, I have created what stands to become the single greatest access to start-up capital ever created. The "Entrepreneurs Credit Card" and attendant Program of successfully establishing one's own business stands as an unmatched opportunity. Never before has an unsecured capital debt structure in this magnitude ($175k) been available to the newly minted entrepreneur, complete with an initial outsourced and seasoned support team of professional service providers. Coupled with my own actual hard-won experience, earned over 150 start-ups in literally dozens of fields,  the "Entrepreneurs Credit Card" recipient will receive the greatest possible chance of business success ever available before to the start-up applicant.https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/entrepreneurs-credit-card-launched-peter-burns?trk=prof-posthttp://entcreditcard.com/imagineUpdate:Since the publication of the Linked In blog of December 10th (see link), outlining my "Start-Up Program" utilizing the $100k "Entrepreneurs Credit Card" as the initial funding resource...we are in definitive talks with 27 would-be entrepreneurs, representing nearly $3 million of funding commitments for 27 brand new business launches!https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/baking-cakeentrepreneur-style-peter-burns?trk=mp-reader-cardhttp://entcreditcard.com/imagine
Greater New York City Area, Southern California

Taking from a lifetime of experience in living among members of "The 1%"​ (New Canaan, Nantucket, Sanibel Island) having family members that run both a very successful NYSE company and multi-billion dollar wealth fund and being at the stage of my life (I'm 60, unmarried with two grown children with families), I have just turned my avocation into my latest venture in Luxury Lifestyle Management. In the late 90s, I was one of the first members of the pioneer Destination Club, loved it and always wanted to figure out a way to turn this part-time lifestyle, into a full time profession. In doing what comes naturally, I have realized that lifelong dream.This unique application of monetizing underutilized assets (vacation villas, jets and yachts) will create a new "disruptive technology"​, first, in the field of Luxury Vacation Villa Rentals. Across the USA and the world, Luxury Vacation Homes and Villas are already popular. Prime destinations like California, Florida  and Colorado have many homes and villas available and demand is also high in other cities across the USA and the world.What is just as intriguing is that this niche market also opens up the most unique application of a truly, "21st Century Product Placement Service,"​ yet another "disruptive technology." (www.theassetexchangecollection.com)I have surrounded myself with diverse industry leaders to form the new entity and am very busy aggregating elite products and services such as the finest luxury tour providers, private jet travel, yacht excursions, luxury watches, luxury furniture, and a plethora of luxury goods and the largest collection of exceptional multi-million dollar residences in the finest resort locations on the planet...exclusively for the patronage of luxury lifestyle clients. A luxury web site will organize and catalog these assets for villa members and clients.

UPDATE-I recently re-entered the Cost Segregation Marketing business and have been directing clients to my new engineering partner (35,000 cost segregation studies to date). I am also utilizing my Patent Pending Charitable Fund Raising Tool, using Cost Segregation Studies to generate US Tax Refunds that are then donated to designated 501c3s. (www.hlcostseg.com). We have successfully adapted the powerful cost segregation engineering process to our client base of luxury vacation villas and boutique hotels. (www.hlcostseg.com)Cost Segregation Initiatives (www.costseganalysts.com) markets the engineering process known as the Cost Segregation Study. This process, fully recognized by the IRS as a legitimate and powerful way to return significant tax benefits to the for profit, commercial property owner (individual, corporate) has been "on the books" for 20 years but seldom used outside of the "The Big 4" and only on behalf of only their highest paying clients. In fact, out of the estimated 81MM commercial buildings in the U.S. in private hands, only an estimated 20,000 cost segregation studies were performed in 2006. This means that there are approximately $400B in untapped tax benefits, which could be in the hands of the property owners. Cost Segregation Initiatives, has created a seamless method to free up these tax benefits to interested commercial property owners at a fraction of the cost that the "Big 4" would charge for the exact same service. Our engineers are all "Big 4" trained experts.www.hlcostseg.com

Over the past two years, after recognizing the fact that multi-million dollar vacation villas are occupied an industry average of only 26%, we started acquiring blocks of unused time in nearly 1000 such spectacular villas around the world. Due to the unique methodology of acquiring this unused time, we are then able to offer these villas at unpublished rates...often 30%-40% off the retail pricing to members of our Closed User Groups. This is unprecedented...luxury vacation villas that are "full service" (concierge, private chef, et al) at significantly discounted rates to luxury travelers looking for deals offered nowhere else. This company is truly a "game changer" in the luxury vacation world.www.hlvillas.com   www.lv4less.com

I volunteered for an international charity in Ethiopia for 6 months. I acted as the de facto Entrepreneur-In-Residence assisting the NGO in creating unique opportunities to help their beneficiaries. I created at least one grant opportunity and obtained the sponsored funding (over $130k) for the charity. There are a dozen additional initiatives that I came up with and which may become NGO projects in the future. https://docs.google.com/a/stern.nyu.edu/file/d/0B7rvWfEJ-mLXRnY1Z0xMRVFYMnM/edit?usp=drive_web

I fist met Peter Burns around 2005, been so long I don't have the exact year, but it's been at least that.  Peter loves entrepreneurism and is truly at heart a builder and connector.  When I met Peter he was establishing a "Club e" which was an incubator for startup businesses, any and all businesses.  Peter put together regular monthly events where like minded people got together and shared, some did business with each other and others we remained friends.  It was a fantastic experience for me as a young semi-seasoned entrepreneur.Since 2005 I would sometimes reach out to Peter, he remembered me, he opened up his contact book to help me, with no reciprocity, just open heart to help.  He has helped me more than once in the past, for that I was able to move forward and accomplish my goals a little quicker, thank you Peter.Peter today is still a go getter and has a larger heart than ever.  I recently reached out to Peter in early 2017 for some reason, don't know why, but summer 2017 I was looking for something specific.  During the conversation I asked him "do you know anyone who is in the ..... industry"  and he says "yes" so I introduced him to a friend / business guy of mine named Jerry, and in the past week or two these two guys have put together something so amazing, their combined efforts will help new entrepreneurs grow a business faster than ever in many ways never seen possible.My hats off to peter Burns, long time business colleague and friend.  Peter Than You from the bottom of my Heart!Peace,George Pauli

summary: I am a serial start-up entrepreneur specializing in the establishment and operation of niche market multi-location businesses. My professional experience encompasses that entrepreneurial arena. In my 40 years -- I started at age 19 -- of business formation and ownership, I've started, run, sold and/or expanded between 100-150 individual businesses in dozens of fields. In August 2013, I left the US and moved to Africa. I volunteered with a large international NGO as their de facto "Entrepreneur-In-Residence"​ and not only was I able to create innovative new ways to help the NGO's beneficiaries but I discovered vast new opportunities as a private businessman in "The Dark Continent."​ I had been busy establishing a half a dozen new enterprises with African joint venture partners and was working closely with both the local government as well as our US Embassy to create a viable and very lucrative bilateral pipeline between my business connections in the US and those in Africa.Specialties: Since founding my first company as a teenager, I have found that my expertise lies primarily in the establishing and growing of niche market businesses in fragmented industries...of any kind. I have a particularly good skill set of recognizing opportunities early on in the process and being able to fund almost any enterprise with creative financing techniques I've learned over my career. I am manifesting this innate skill set now on a magnified basis:https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/you-wannapreneur-start-up-entrepreneur-peter-burns?trk=prof-postTwo years ago, I  entered the luxury lifestyle consulting business and I had relocated back to my roots in the North East. My new venture includes luxury vacation homes and villas.... soon luxury products like yachts and jets. (www.luxuryproductplacement.com). We now have 974 multi-million dollar vacation villas.True to my nature, I started the "Entrepreneurs Credit Card" three months ago and Avia Travel Services very recently too.
name: Peter Burns
title: Founder at Entrepreneurs Credit Card
